name.baseName: Aluminum ingot casting ; Primary aluminum ingot ; Liquid primary aluminum ; 2013
铝锭铸造 ; 原生铝锭 ; 液态原铝 ; 2013年

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The primary aluminum ingot casting process is intended for generating raw aluminum ingots from liquid primary aluminum. This process is critical in the production of high-purity aluminum products that are essential in various applications, including but not limited to aerospace components, electrical conductors, building materials, and transportation. The aluminum ingots produced through this process are also used in further manufacturing and fabrication processes that require primary aluminum.
初级铝锭铸造过程旨在从液态原级铝中产生原铝锭。这一过程在生产用途广泛的高纯度铝产品中至关重要，包括航空部件、电导体、建筑材料和交通工具等。通过这一工艺生产的铝锭还可用于需要使用初级铝的进一步制造和加工过程。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The primary aluminum ingot casting process is intended for generating raw aluminum ingots from liquid primary aluminum. This process is critical in the production of high-purity aluminum products that are essential in various applications, including but not limited to aerospace components, electrical conductors, building materials, and transportation. The aluminum ingots produced through this process are also used in further manufacturing and fabrication processes that require primary aluminum.
初级铝锭铸造过程旨在从液态原级铝中产生原铝锭。这一过程在生产用途广泛的高纯度铝产品中至关重要，包括航空部件、电导体、建筑材料和交通工具等。通过这一工艺生产的铝锭还可用于需要使用初级铝的进一步制造和加工过程。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The data in this study refers to the LCA data of PA, SA, electricity, and other background data. The PA data were obtained from statistical data sources, and the SA data were mainly obtained from the literatures. The background data were mainly derived from the Chinese localization LCA database CAS RCEES 2018, which was established by the Research Center for Eco-Environmental Sciences, Chinese Academy of Sciences and covers LCA data for energy, materials, transportation, waste management etc.
本研究的数据参考了PA、SA、电力等背景数据的LCA数据。PA数据来自统计数据源，SA数据主要来自文献。背景数据主要来自中国科学院生态环境研究中心CASRCEES 2018建立的中国本地化LCA数据库，涵盖能源、材料、交通、废物管理等LCA数据。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).
Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This LCA data set is specific to the process of casting primary aluminum ingots in the year 2013, and should be used with consideration to its temporal and geographical relevance. Users should also take into account that the primary aluminum (PA) data are obtained from statistical sources, while the secondary aluminum (SA) data are mainly derived from literature. For the background data, the CAS RCEES 2018 database should be consulted, which includes LCA information pertinent to energy, materials, transportation, and waste management within the Chinese context. When applying this data, users must pay attention to methodological consistency, ensuring that any comparative assessments follow appropriate category rules and boundaries.
本LCA数据集详细说明了2013年铸造初级铝锭的过程，并应考虑其时间和地域相关性。用户还应注意，原铝（PA）数据来自统计资料来源，而次级铝（SA）数据主要来自文献。对于背景数据，应当咨询CAS RCEES 2018数据库，该数据库涵盖了中国背景下与能源、材料、运输和废物管理相关的LCA信息。应用这些数据时，用户必须注意方法论的一致性，确保任何比较评估遵循适当的类别规则和边界。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
